posts.post_content:
Free s/h.  Any form of payment accepted.  

Although PMs will be read and responded to, I very much prefer email at: [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

You can also email me for better scans, questions, comments, suggestions, etc.

A few things, so I can keep this as organized as possible:

1 -- I will address all correspondences in the order of date/time delivery into my email box (including PMs).
2 -- Please Note:  I work evenings/nights, and keep somewhat odd hours. Therefore response time may vary depending when I am on the computer. However, all correspondences will be addressed.
3 -- “I’ll take it” will take president over ongoing correspondences.
4 –  Satisfaction guaranteed.

Thanks, Scott


Help me get these cards off my desk.

Take 20% off starting price / BIN on any T206 (raw or graded).  

The T205 auctions will run their course (we can talk Cobb if interested).

[url]http://www.ebay.com/sch/sg713/m.html?item=141629278530&ssPageName=STRK%3AMESELX%3AIT&rt=nc&_trksid=p2047675.l2562[/url]

Thanks, Scott
Already bought from this, but I just wanted to say thanks for the amazing deal.  Could not recommend Scott higher!
Scott is a good guy who cuts good deals.

I received the 4 nice SGC HOF'ers in the mail today.  It came in one of those dreaded "WE CARE" wrappers that begins with "We sincerely regret the damage to your mail . . .".

However, due to the great job of packaging you did, the cards arrived in tact and undamaged.  USPS say they care, but you obviously really do!

Posting here just so other potential customers know you are very conscientious and reliable.  Also you gave me a great deal on these cards - thanks!
Scott is a great guy, buy with confidence.

20% off bump......

Thanks, Scott
